findings.title: Risk of funds becoming trapped in blacklisted addresses
findings.description: The system exhibits a high degree of centralization, creating a risk of funds becoming trapped in blacklisted addresses.

findings.title: Consolidating control and potentially raising concerns about equitable distribution
findings.description: The entire token supply is minted to the contract deployer, consolidating control and potentially raising concerns about equitable distribution.

findings.title: Privileged roles can arbitrarily add, remove from blacklist, enable or disable the blacklist
findings.description: Privileged roles have unrestricted access to modify the blacklist without any checks, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.
